game.name: Millennium Dream
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Wander a dreamscape woven from millennial memories.Capture gentle moments of old times, find forgotten corners, and gather lost childhood fragments. We always rushed to grow up. This time, slow your steps. Even slower. Sink into this unrepeatable old dream
game.shortDescriptionEn: Wander a dreamscape woven from millennial memories.Capture gentle moments of old times, find forgotten corners, and gather lost childhood fragments. We always rushed to grow up. This time, slow your steps. Even slower. Sink into this unrepeatable old dream
